title: Treasure Hunter
description:
This adventure is take place in a dangerous labyrinth.
In there you will need to go through it and avoid the monsters and the obsticals
in your way and reach the treasure chest at the end of the labyrinth.
To win you only need to touch the chest, but be careful the monsters and
obsticals are so deadly you only need to touch them a bit and you are dead.
For navigate you can use the arrow buttons on your keyboard.
goodLuck: I wish you the best of luck to complete this challenge.
